stimulusHtml: A circular platform has a radius R and rotational inertia I. The platform rotates around a fixed pivot at its center with negligible friction and an initial angular velocity ω . A child of mass m (represented by the small circle in the figure above) runs tangentially with speed v and jumps on the outer edge of the platform. When the child is standing on the outer edge of the platform, the new angular velocity is
choicesHtml: Iω I+m R 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D7E@

Iω+mvR I+m R 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4124@

( I ω 2 +m v 2 I ) 1/2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42DC@

( I ω 2 +m v 2 I+m R 2 ) 1/2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4699@
